item.title: New starts

Just booked a trip for thailand with friends for next month. I’m very excited and I want to thank god for being this blessed.

Ramadan is around the corner too ðŸ‘€

Starting on a legacy .NET project today @work - so many learning opportunities are opening, feeling very excited about it.

item.title: About
item.description:
About me

I’m a software engineer at Anansi Solutions, where I spend a lot of time working on different projects at the same time. I joined Anansi Solutions in September 2025, a couple months after graduating from QMUL.

I spent 3 years as a computer science student at QMUL, where I learned about core CS principles with some practical experience. Studying in London was enriching, its diversity and energy shaped how I approach problems collaboratively and think globally.
